boardgame.name: D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Attack Wing
Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Attack Wing
boardgame.description: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons: Attack Wing uses the core rule set of the FlightPath game system seen previously in Star Wars: X-Wing and Star Trek: Attack Wing, but with a Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons twist as the players now control dogfighting dragons, while also having forces on the ground such as giants and magic users. As with Star Trek: Attack Wing, the Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons: Attack Wing game series consists of a starter set and expansion packs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons: Attack Wing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Starter Set includes three pre-painted dragons, maneuver dials, and upgrade cards and tokens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

A large bundle. Includes base set, Frost Giant, Sun Elf Wizard, Sun Elf Troop, and Hobgoblin Troop. Also includes components in a nice plano case and other plastic cases. All large cards sleeved with color backed sleeves. Will also include a laser line pointer. Components all like new. Does not include original boxes, but will ship securely.
For geeklist auction winner only
In perfect condition. Shipping to Europe - 15 euros. Elsewhere, please ask!

This item includes the base game and the following expansions: + Dwarven Ballista + Green Dragon + Frost Giant + Hobgoblin Troop + Sun Elf Guard Troop + Sun Elf Wizard + Wraith The dragons are stored in the original box, though I do not have all of the original insert. I will bubble wrap the dragons for safety. I will include the large Plano box that I use to store tokens, cards, and expansion figures. Add $16 for shipping of this over-sized item.

This listing is for one lot of D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Attack Wing figures (and all associated cards and tokens), which includes one of every retail release from the Starter Set through Wave 7, including TIAMAT, BAHAMUT, and the PREMIUM SLIVER DRAGON! (Yes, these are the DDAW versions, with the proper stands, cardboard, and cards for game use, not the Icons of the Realms display figs.) Most items Wave 4 and later are still NIB. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll list everything in detail when time permits; PM me if you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t wait! The lot total price is less than OLGS discount prices, including for the premium figs. Buyer pays shipping... not terribly heavy, but will likely require two boxes. Pickup could be arranged in the El Paso, Albuquerque, Las Cruces area.
